mapper.select: select seq, id, title, content as bContent, writer, regdate, moddate, state, type, hitcount, file_exist, password from board order by seq desc
select seq, id, title, content as bContent, writer, regdate, moddate, state, type, hitcount, file_exist, password from board where seq = ${seq}
mapper.insert: insert board ( id, title, content, writer, regdate, moddate, state, type, hitcount, file_exist, password )value( #{id}, #{title} , #{content}, #{writer}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), 1, 1, 0, #{file_exist}, #{password} )

insert board_file ( seq, board_id, board_seq, org_filename, save_path, save_filename, file_size, state )value( #{seq}, #{board_id}, #{board_seq}, #{org_filename}, #{save_path}, #{save_filename}, #{file_size}, #{state} )
mapper.select: select seq, board_id, board_seq, org_filename, save_path, save_filename, file_size, state from board_file where board_id = #{id} and board_seq = ${seq} order by seq asc
